Most Illustrious Sir

Regarding the mercury and powders of Joanes, which Your Lordship Antônio Manuel Correia da Câmara shall, at the first opportunity, send half of each item to the War Train in this capital, in order to satisfy the requisitions that various overseers of estancias in the state make of these drugs.

God keep Your Lordship  
Secretariat of Finance in Caçapava, March 15, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Collector of the Municipalities of Alegrete and São Borja.  
Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic

To citizen Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Collector of the municipalities of São Borja and Alegrete.  
From the Ministry of Finance. March 15, 1839.  
Almeida.
